name: Budget
text: §184-8  Budget.  The department of land and natural resources shall submit to the director of finance, annually, the budgetary estimates and information required by chapter 40 and shall include therein estimates of the financial requirements of the department for the operation of a state parks system as provided by this part. [L 1949, c 185, §7; RL 1955, §19-39; am L Sp 1959 1st, c 13, §2; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §§14, 21; am L 1961, c 132, §2; am L 1963, c 114, §1; HRS §184-8]
